title: "spatstat data"
format: html
editor: visual

\-\--

## Read data

```{r}
install.packages("spatstat.data")
library(spatstat.data)
library(spatstat)
data(ants)
#or
data(amacrine)
#or
data("lansing")
```

\-\--

```{r}

plot(ants)
plot(split(ants))

plot(amacrine)
plot(lansing)
plot(split(lansing))
plot(split(amacrine))
```

```{r}
summary(lansing)
```

## Explore data

```{r}
data(lansing)
lansing
summary(lansing)
```

\-\--

## Visualize data

```{r}
plot(lansing)
```

```{r}
levels(marks(amacrine))
```

```{r}

plot(density(split(lansing)), ribbon = FALSE)
```

```{r}
plot(relrisk(ants), bw.relrisk(ants), relative =TRUE)
```
